Name: tin mine operation | tin concentrate | EN15804GD, U
Category: B:Mining and quarrying/07:Mining of metal ores/072:Mining of non-ferrous metal ores/0729:Mining of other non-ferrous metal ores
Description: The modeled mine is an underground mine. The concentration plant from which the data was collected has a capacity of 2,900 metric tons per day. Two concentration methods are used in the production process: gravimetric (84.21% concentrates) and direct flotation  (15.79%) with an average water consumption of 23,78 m3 per dry metric ton of ore.
